Text: I'm the seeder of this torrent and I don't know, what the hell is going wrong. But can anyone download this torrent? from my side, everything seems to be ok, but here on piratbay I see all the time "Seeders: 0", but I am seeding all the time!!!

Hi
Thank you for the upload!
Nobody can download the torrent as long as it says "Seeders: 0" and it means no seed. So you should check the upload or redo the upload.
(Actually, I tried to download it anyways and it did not work!)

I would like to ask you put some more info about the movie, such as production or releas year, the number (Ekhrajiha 1, 2 or 3), director, duration, video/audio format, etc (see other movie uploads to see the parameter s you can put)

Please upload if you have other Ekhrajiha movies or any other persian / iraninan / farsi movies.

Regards
